EmailTemplate.name: VinWorx Fall KC Registration Now Available
EmailTemplate.subject: VinWorx Fall Kansas City 2012 Nov. 5th- 7th: Registration Now Open!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Dates have been set for VinWorx this fall in Kansas City, November 5th - 7th! Register today as spots are filling fast for this invaluable training and networking event. Sign up today for only $399 to participate in this exciting program! It would be great to have your dealership in attendance.
WHAT IT IS: VinWorx is a networking and advanced certification summit for MotoSnap users. A hands-on workshop held under the VinUniversity umbrella, attenddees will have the opportunity to participate in specialized sessions to learn about and train on new and existing integrated product solutions. Connect and collaborate with other VinSolutions dealer customers while relaxing amidst the sights and sounds of Kansas City; return with best-practice tips and advanced skills that will help your dealership find, sell and keep customers more profitably.
WHY GO: *Your registration includes all of the below. Train: Complete 8-course training workshops FastTrax Certification Advanced Certification opportunities Network: Interact & collaborate with other dealers & users Meet the VinCare team! Networking reception at the historic Hotel Phillips Relax: 2 nights at the luxurious Hotel Phillips in the heart of Kansas City Meal accommodations during the meetings
WHO IS GOING: * Get certified on 3 levels in just 2 days! Dealers: Dealer Admins in need of Certification MotoSnap Certified Users in need of a refresher MotoSnap Certified Users in need of advanced training
Staff: Jim Nelson, VP of Operations VinStructor Managers VinPro Dealer Advocates VinCare Website Support Experts
OUR MISSION: VinSolutions is committed to provide training in a variety of formats throughout multiple venues to enhance the learning experience. Certified MotoSnap VinPros ensure that all participants are able to fully understand and operate the system effectively both during and after implementation through practical application and open communication to develop genuine partnerships with our valuable users.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/ You and your dealership will be happy you did! Please contact pamela.lasley@vinsolutions.com for more information.
